Starting October 29, On a Wednesday is a taking a few weeks off to focus on our new website. We'll be back soon with some surprises!

On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

David

 Stuy-Town

⏲ 4:27 p.m. on Wednesday, July 23

What are you doing today?

I’m a gate monitor and I’m checking IDs, making sure that guests and residents are here. I’m also a husband, I’m not a dad yet. I’m sitting here, reading 48 Laws of Power. This is my third read. It’s a good book. I’m enjoying the weather.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Going home. Who wants to be at work all day?

What are you doing tomorrow?

Same thing. Tomorrow I’m going to the doctor. I just did a physical, so I have to get it checked out. And I’m going to the Gap tomorrow to return some jeans.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
